title: Command '['C:\\video2x-4.8.1-win32-full\\dependencies\\ffmpeg\\bin\\ffmpeg', '-hwaccel', 'auto', '-y', '-i', 'C:\\Users\\Stream-PC\\Desktop\\Outlaw Star_output\\Outlawstar 1X3.mp4', '-pix_fmt', 'rgb24', 'C:\\Users\\STREAM~1\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmpl3gmd8ny\\extracted_%0d.png']' returned non-zero exit status 3221225477.
body:
## Component Versions

Please at least fill in the release version and GUI or CLI version.

- **Video2X release version**: 2.8.1
- **Upscaler version**:
- **GUI version**: 2.8.1
- **CLI version**: 2.8.1

## Symptom

It appears that when multiple video files are queued for processing that the first video will complete the upscale process but when the next video begins to start the process after the first one finishes this error appears. Unfortunately an error log never fully generates.
